bike.description: FACT 10m carbon front triangle, Az1 construction, M5 aluminum rear triangle with rear brake cantilevers for non-disc set-up, 100mm travel, FACT carbon link

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ Flow Control valve, adjustable from HT firm to Trail Tune, air spring, adjustable rebound
1 1/8" threadless, Campy spec integrated sealed cartridge bearing
Alloy single bolt, 36.9mm clamp ID, for carbon frames
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
